jobs.name: :construction_worker: Construction Worker
jobs.info: Work like the minimum wage workers, feel their pain

jobs.name: :farmer: Farmer
jobs.info: So you learnt a few agricultural tricks or two from your grandfather, eh? Put it to the test then! Live your life connected to plants, soil and animals

jobs.name: :cook: Kitchen Helper
jobs.info: Thanks to your friend, you got referred into this food chain. Now work till your nose hurts from all the grease!

jobs.name: :teacher: School Teacher
jobs.info: Think you can teach better than the lousy adults? Go ahead, take control over a chaotic classroom

jobs.name: :factory_worker: Factory Worker
jobs.info: All those parties and lack of career goals brought you here, so it's your responsibility to survive this harsh world!

jobs.name: :mechanic: Junior Mechanic
jobs.info: You loved machines or cars so much you ended up dropping out of school. Now continue your life without a degree!
